General.Name: Morn Sun Feed Mill Corp
General.Description: Morn Sun Feed Mill Corp. engages in the production and trading of poultry and livestock feed in Taiwan. It offers layer feed for ducks and chicken, breeder feed for goose, and local poultry feed; livestock feed for piglets, sow, and hogs; and eggs. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: 30, Ho Ping West Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 100
